typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesOrderLines
source(output(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,0),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,0),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		SurrogateKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesOrderLineTable
SalesOrderLines derive(IsActive = 1) ~> AddingIsActive
AddingIsActive keyGenerate(output(SurrogateKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SalesOrderLineTable select(mapColumn(
		SQL_OrderLineID = OrderLineID,
		SQL_OrderID = OrderID,
		SQL_StockItemID = StockItemID,
		SQL_Description = Description,
		SQL_PackageTypeID = PackageTypeID,
		SQL_Quantity = Quantity,
		SQL_UnitPrice = UnitPrice,
		SQL_TaxRate = TaxRate,
		SQL_PickedQuantity = PickedQuantity,
		SQL_PickingCompletedWhen = PickingCompletedWhen,
		SQL_LastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		SQL_LastEditedWhen = LastEditedWhen,
		SQL_IsActive = IsActive,
		SQL_SurrogateKey = SurrogateKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SalesOrderLines, Select1 lookup(OrderLineID == SQL_OrderLineID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_OrderLineID)) ~> ExistingRows
ExistingRows select(mapColumn(
		SQL_OrderLineID,
		SQL_OrderID,
		SQL_StockItemID,
		SQL_Description,
		SQL_PackageTypeID,
		SQL_Quantity,
		SQL_UnitPrice,
		SQL_TaxRate,
		SQL_PickedQuantity,
		SQL_PickingCompletedWhen,
		SQL_LastEditedBy,
		SQL_LastEditedWhen,
		SQL_IsActive,
		SQL_SurrogateKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(SQL_IsActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,0),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,0),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		SurrogateKey as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderLineID,
		OrderID,
		StockItemID,
		Description,
		PackageTypeID,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice,
		TaxRate,
		PickedQuantity,
		PickingCompletedWhen,
		LastEditedBy,
		LastEditedWhen,
		IsActive,
		SurrogateKey
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,0),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,0),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		SurrogateKey as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SurrogateKey'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderLineID = SQL_OrderLineID,
		OrderID = SQL_OrderID,
		StockItemID = SQL_StockItemID,
		Description = SQL_Description,
		PackageTypeID = SQL_PackageTypeID,
		Quantity = SQL_Quantity,
		UnitPrice = SQL_UnitPrice,
		TaxRate = SQL_TaxRate,
		PickedQuantity = SQL_PickedQuantity,
		PickingCompletedWhen = SQL_PickingCompletedWhen,
		LastEditedBy = SQL_LastEditedBy,
		LastEditedWhen = SQL_LastEditedWhen,
		IsActive = SQL_IsActive,
		SurrogateKey = SQL_SurrogateKey
	)) ~> sink2
